operations.name: Add to Cart
mentioned_rules: Products must be in stock to be added to cart

operations.name: Place Order
mentioned_rules: Customers must be registered to place orders
Orders over $50 qualify for free shipping

operations.name: Cancel Order
mentioned_rules: Orders can only be cancelled before shipping

business_rules: Customers must be registered to place orders
Products must be in stock to be added to cart
Orders over $50 qualify for free shipping
Orders can only be cancelled before shipping
ui_mentions: Shopping cart view with items, quantities, and total price
Payment method selection (credit card or PayPal)

ambiguities.subject: Product
ambiguities.question: What is the unique identifier format for products?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Auto-generated UUID or sequential ID

ambiguities.subject: Product
ambiguities.question: What is the data type and constraints for product price?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Decimal with 2 decimal places, minimum 0.01

ambiguities.subject: Product
ambiguities.question: What is the maximum length for product name and description?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Name: 200 chars, Description: 5000 chars

ambiguities.subject: Product
ambiguities.question: Should products support multiple images? How many?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, up to 10 images with one primary

ambiguities.subject: Product
ambiguities.question: Should removed products be soft-deleted or permanently deleted?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Soft delete to preserve order history references

ambiguities.subject: Product
ambiguities.question: Can a product belong to multiple categories?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Single primary category with optional secondary categories

ambiguities.subject: Product
ambiguities.question: Is product change history/audit trail required?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Track price changes and who modified
options: Full audit trail with user and changes

ambiguities.subject: ProductVariant
ambiguities.question: Does each variant have its own price, or inherit from parent product?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Variants can have price override (optional, defaults to parent)
options: Optional override with default to parent

ambiguities.subject: ProductVariant
ambiguities.question: Does each variant have its own inventory/stock level?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, inventory tracked per variant

ambiguities.subject: ProductVariant
ambiguities.question: What variant types are supported beyond size and color?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Configurable variant types per product

ambiguities.subject: ProductVariant
ambiguities.question: Does each variant have its own SKU/identifier?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, unique SKU per variant

ambiguities.subject: Cart
ambiguities.question: How long should an inactive cart persist before expiration?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: 30 days for logged-in users, 7 days for guests

ambiguities.subject: Cart
ambiguities.question: Should guest users (not logged in) be able to have a cart?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, with cart merge on login

ambiguities.subject: Cart
ambiguities.question: What happens when an item in cart goes out of stock?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Item remains with warning, blocked at checkout

ambiguities.subject: CartItem
ambiguities.question: Is there a maximum quantity limit per item?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Limited by available stock

ambiguities.subject: CartItem
ambiguities.question: Should cart items store the price at time of adding, or always use current price?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Always use current price, notify on price changes

ambiguities.subject: Order
ambiguities.question: What is the order number format?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Year prefix + sequential number (e.g., ORD-2024-00001)

ambiguities.subject: Order
ambiguities.question: What are the valid state transitions for orders?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: pending→confirmed→shipped→delivered, with cancelled possible from pending/confirmed

ambiguities.subject: Order
ambiguities.question: Should orders track item prices at time of purchase?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, snapshot prices at order time

ambiguities.subject: Order
ambiguities.question: Is order modification allowed after placement (before shipping)?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: No modification, must cancel and reorder

ambiguities.subject: Order
ambiguities.question: Are partial shipments supported (splitting an order)?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: No, single shipment per order

ambiguities.subject: Order
ambiguities.question: Is order history/audit trail required for status changes?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, track all status changes with timestamps
options: Full audit with timestamps and actor

ambiguities.subject: Order
ambiguities.question: What additional order attributes are needed (notes, gift message, etc.)?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Optional order notes field

ambiguities.subject: Customer
ambiguities.question: What customer profile attributes are required?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Email, password, first name, last name, phone (optional)
options: Full profile with phone, DOB, preferences

ambiguities.subject: Customer
ambiguities.question: What is the unique identifier for customers?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Email address as unique identifier

ambiguities.subject: Customer
ambiguities.question: What are the password requirements?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Minimum 8 chars with at least one number

ambiguities.subject: Customer
ambiguities.question: Can customers save multiple shipping addresses?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, with one default address

ambiguities.subject: Customer
ambiguities.question: Can customers save multiple payment methods?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, with one default payment method

ambiguities.subject: Customer
ambiguities.question: Should customer accounts be soft-deleted or allow permanent deletion (GDPR)?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Support both soft delete and full data erasure for GDPR

ambiguities.subject: Customer
ambiguities.question: Is email verification required for registration?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, email verification required before placing orders

ambiguities.subject: ShippingAddress
ambiguities.question: What fields are required for a shipping address?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Street, city, state/province, postal code, country, recipient name

ambiguities.subject: ShippingAddress
ambiguities.question: Which countries/regions are supported for shipping?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Domestic only (single country)

ambiguities.subject: ShippingAddress
ambiguities.question: Should address validation be performed?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Basic format validation, no external service

ambiguities.subject: PaymentMethod
ambiguities.question: What credit card types are accepted?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Visa, Mastercard, American Express

ambiguities.subject: PaymentMethod
ambiguities.question: What payment gateway/processor will be used?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Stripe for credit cards, PayPal integration

ambiguities.subject: PaymentMethod
ambiguities.question: Should payment details be stored for future purchases?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Store tokenized payment methods via payment gateway

ambiguities.subject: Category
ambiguities.question: Should categories support hierarchical nesting (subcategories)?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, support 2-3 levels of nesting

ambiguities.subject: Category
ambiguities.question: What attributes does a category have?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Name, description, image, display order

ambiguities.subject: Category
ambiguities.question: Can categories be deactivated/hidden without deletion?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, support active/inactive status

ambiguities.subject: Inventory
ambiguities.question: Should inventory support reserved stock (items in carts/pending orders)?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, track available vs reserved stock

ambiguities.subject: Inventory
ambiguities.question: Should low stock alerts be supported?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, configurable threshold per product

ambiguities.subject: Inventory
ambiguities.question: Is inventory history/audit trail needed?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, track all stock changes with reason

ambiguities.subject: Inventory
ambiguities.question: Should backorders be supported when out of stock?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: No, strict stock enforcement

ambiguities.subject: Order
ambiguities.question: What happens to inventory when an order is cancelled?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Automatically restore stock on cancellation

ambiguities.subject: Order
ambiguities.question: Is a refund/return process needed?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Out of scope for MVP, add later

ambiguities.subject: Browse Products
ambiguities.question: What filtering and search capabilities are required for browsing products?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Filter by category, price range, and availability; basic keyword search

ambiguities.subject: Browse Products
ambiguities.question: What sorting options are available for product listings?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Sort by name, price (asc/desc), newest first

ambiguities.subject: Browse Products
ambiguities.question: How should product listing be paginated?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: 20 products per page with pagination controls

ambiguities.subject: Browse Products
ambiguities.question: Should out-of-stock products be visible in listings?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Show with 'out of stock' indicator, not purchasable

ambiguities.subject: Add to Cart
ambiguities.question: What happens when adding an item already in the cart?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Increment quantity of existing cart item

ambiguities.subject: Add to Cart
ambiguities.question: What is the minimum and maximum quantity that can be added?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Minimum 1, maximum limited by available stock

ambiguities.subject: Add to Cart
ambiguities.question: Can guest (non-authenticated) users add items to cart?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, with session-based cart

ambiguities.subject: Add to Cart
ambiguities.question: How should the system handle concurrent stock claims (race condition)?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Allow add, validate stock at checkout

ambiguities.subject: Add to Cart
ambiguities.question: What feedback should the user receive after adding to cart?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Toast notification with view cart option

ambiguities.subject: Add to Cart
ambiguities.question: If product has variants, how is variant selection handled?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Variant must be selected before add to cart is enabled
options: Add base product, select variant in cart

ambiguities.subject: Update Cart Quantity
ambiguities.question: What happens when quantity is updated to exceed available stock?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Limit to available stock and show notification

ambiguities.subject: Update Cart Quantity
ambiguities.question: What happens when quantity is set to zero?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Treat as remove from cart

ambiguities.subject: Update Cart Quantity
ambiguities.question: Is this operation idempotent with the same quantity value?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, setting same quantity is a no-op

ambiguities.subject: Remove from Cart
ambiguities.question: Should removal require confirmation?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: No confirmation, but provide undo option

ambiguities.subject: Remove from Cart
ambiguities.question: What happens when removing the last item from cart?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Show empty cart state with continue shopping link

ambiguities.subject: Place Order
ambiguities.question: What payment validation occurs before order is placed?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Full payment authorization before creating order

ambiguities.subject: Place Order
ambiguities.question: What happens if payment fails?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Show error, keep cart intact, allow retry

ambiguities.subject: Place Order
ambiguities.question: What happens if stock becomes unavailable during checkout?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Show error for affected items, allow order modification

ambiguities.subject: Place Order
ambiguities.question: When is inventory decremented for ordered items?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Immediately upon successful payment

ambiguities.subject: Place Order
ambiguities.question: How is the free shipping threshold ($50) calculated?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Based on subtotal before tax, after discounts

ambiguities.subject: Place Order
ambiguities.question: What shipping options and costs are available below $50?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Standard shipping at flat rate (e.g., $5.99)

ambiguities.subject: Place Order
ambiguities.question: Is tax calculation required? How is it determined?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Calculate based on shipping address (US state tax)

ambiguities.subject: Place Order
ambiguities.question: Are discount codes/coupons supported?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Out of scope for MVP

ambiguities.subject: Place Order
ambiguities.question: Should order placement be logged for audit?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, log all order events with timestamp

ambiguities.subject: Track Order Status
ambiguities.question: Can customers view all their past orders or only recent ones?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: All orders with pagination

ambiguities.subject: Track Order Status
ambiguities.question: What order details are visible to customers?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Items, quantities, prices, status, shipping address, tracking number

ambiguities.subject: Track Order Status
ambiguities.question: Is shipment tracking integration required?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Store tracking number, link to carrier website

ambiguities.subject: Cancel Order
ambiguities.question: What statuses allow order cancellation?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Only 'pending' and 'confirmed' statuses

ambiguities.subject: Cancel Order
ambiguities.question: Is a cancellation reason required?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Optional with predefined options

ambiguities.subject: Cancel Order
ambiguities.question: How is payment refunded on cancellation?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Automatic refund to original payment method

ambiguities.subject: Cancel Order
ambiguities.question: Is inventory automatically restored on cancellation?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, automatically restore stock

ambiguities.subject: Cancel Order
ambiguities.question: Should cancellation send a confirmation email?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, email with cancellation details and refund info

ambiguities.subject: Add Product
ambiguities.question: What validations are required for product data?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Name required (2-200 chars), price > 0, category required

ambiguities.subject: Add Product
ambiguities.question: Should product names be unique?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: No, but warn if duplicate name exists

ambiguities.subject: Add Product
ambiguities.question: What is the initial state/status of a new product?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Draft status, requires explicit publish

ambiguities.subject: Add Product
ambiguities.question: How are product images uploaded and stored?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Upload to cloud storage (S3), store URL reference

ambiguities.subject: Add Product
ambiguities.question: Should product creation be audited?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, log creator and timestamp

ambiguities.subject: Edit Product
ambiguities.question: Can product price be changed if it's in active orders or carts?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, existing orders keep original price, carts get updated price

ambiguities.subject: Edit Product
ambiguities.question: Is concurrent editing by multiple admins handled?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Last write wins with conflict warning

ambiguities.subject: Edit Product
ambiguities.question: Should product edit history be maintained?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Track last modified by/date, not full history

ambiguities.subject: Remove Product
ambiguities.question: What happens to cart items referencing a removed product?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Remove from carts with notification on next cart view

ambiguities.subject: Remove Product
ambiguities.question: Can products with order history be removed?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Soft delete only to preserve order history

ambiguities.subject: Remove Product
ambiguities.question: Should product removal require confirmation?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, confirmation with impact summary

ambiguities.subject: View All Orders
ambiguities.question: What filtering and search options are available for admin order list?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Filter by status, date range, customer; search by order number

ambiguities.subject: View All Orders
ambiguities.question: What order information is shown in the admin list view?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Order number, date, customer, total, status

ambiguities.subject: View All Orders
ambiguities.question: Can orders be exported (CSV, PDF)?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: CSV export for reporting

ambiguities.subject: Update Order Status
ambiguities.question: What are the allowed status transitions?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: pending→confirmed→shipped→delivered (with cancelled as terminal from pending/confirmed)

ambiguities.subject: Update Order Status
ambiguities.question: Should status changes trigger customer notifications?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Email notification on confirmed, shipped, delivered

ambiguities.subject: Update Order Status
ambiguities.question: Can tracking number be added when marking as shipped?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, optional tracking number field when setting shipped

ambiguities.subject: Update Order Status
ambiguities.question: Should status change history be recorded?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, log all changes with admin user and timestamp

ambiguities.subject: Manage Inventory
ambiguities.question: What inventory adjustment types are supported?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Set absolute quantity, or adjust by delta (+/-)

ambiguities.subject: Manage Inventory
ambiguities.question: Is a reason required for inventory adjustments?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Optional reason with predefined options

ambiguities.subject: Manage Inventory
ambiguities.question: Can inventory go negative?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: No, minimum is zero

ambiguities.subject: Manage Inventory
ambiguities.question: Should bulk inventory updates be supported?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, CSV import for bulk updates

ambiguities.subject: Manage Inventory
ambiguities.question: Should inventory changes be audited?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes, full audit trail with before/after values

ambiguities.subject: Send Confirmation Email
ambiguities.question: What information is included in the confirmation email?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Order number, items, total, shipping address, estimated delivery

ambiguities.subject: Send Confirmation Email
ambiguities.question: What happens if email sending fails?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Queue for retry, log failure, don't block order

ambiguities.subject: Send Confirmation Email
ambiguities.question: Is this operation idempotent (can it be safely retried)?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Yes with deduplication to prevent duplicate emails

ambiguities.subject: Send Confirmation Email
ambiguities.question: What email service/provider will be used?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Transactional email service (SendGrid, AWS SES)

ambiguities.subject: Send Confirmation Email
ambiguities.question: Should email sending be synchronous or asynchronous?
ambiguities.suggested_answer: Asynchronous via message queue

input_content:
# E-Commerce Order System

## Overview

A simple online store where customers can browse products, add them to cart, and place orders.

## User Stories

### US-001: Browse Products
As a customer, I want to browse available products so that I can decide what to buy.

Products have a name, description, price, and category. Some products may have variants (like size or color).

### US-002: Add to Cart
As a customer, I want to add products to my shopping cart so that I can purchase multiple items at once.

The cart should show the items, quantities, and total price. Customers can update quantities or remove items.

### US-003: Place Order
As a customer, I want to place an order for the items in my cart so that I can receive the products.

When placing an order, the customer provides:
- Shipping address
- Payment method (credit card or PayPal)

After the order is placed, the customer receives a confirmation email.

### US-004: Track Order Status
As a customer, I want to see the status of my orders so that I know when they will arrive.

Order statuses include: pending, confirmed, shipped, delivered.

### US-005: Cancel Order
As a customer, I want to cancel my order if I change my mind.

## Business Rules

- Customers must be registered to place orders
- Products must be in stock to be added to cart
- Orders over $50 qualify for free shipping
- Orders can only be cancelled before shipping

## Admin Features

- Add/edit/remove products
- View all orders
- Update order status
- Manage inventory
